pullRequest.title: Issue #2622: Update documentation for windows users
pullRequest.bodyText:
Resolve #2622: Update documentation for windows users
Notes:

The example for linux was already patched so I couldn't replicate it. I used a different case, adapted from #5685.
To accommodate both linux and windows report examples, I moved around some of the text a bit so it looks better (in my opinion).
I also added the variation for Windows to the issue template, in #7926 the user had problems running the issue template commands due to Windows command line.
I'm open to further improvements/suggestions for wording and formatting, so far this is just my take on what needs to be done.

New site looks like this:

nodes.bodyText:
If I remember it correctly, this should be something like that
D:\> SET RUN_LOCALE="-Duser.language=en -Duser.country=US"
D:\> java %RUN_LOCALE% -jar checkstyle-X.XX-all.jar -c config.xml YOUR_FILE.java
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -14,6 +14,9 @@ Check documentation: https://checkstyle.org/config_xxxxxx.html#NameOfAffectedChe
 /var/tmp $ java $RUN_LOCALE -jar checkstyle-X.XX-all.jar -c config.xml YOUR_FILE.java
 #[[PLACE YOUR OUTPUT HERE]]
 ```
+For Windows users, please use `type` instead of `cat` and run 
+`java -Duser.language=en -Duser.country=US -jar checkstyle-X.XX-all.jar
+-c config.xml YOUR_FILE.java` in place of the last command above.

@@ -99,16 +100,49 @@ private static final int SOMETHING = 1; Starting audit... Audit done. +Expected: violation on first line. +/var/tmp/Test.java:1:28: error: '{' is not preceded with whitespace. ]]>

- Always specify what is expected.
+ For Windows users, please use "type" command instead of "cat". + Example of report that we expect: - - Expected: violation on first line. - /var/tmp/Test.java:1:28: error: '{' is not preceded with whitespace. - + type config.xml + + + + + + + + +D:\>type Test.java +class Test { + void method() { + try { return; // false positive + } + catch (Exception e) { return; // false positive + } + } +} + +D:\>java -jar -Duser.language=en -Duser.country=US checkstyle-8.XX-all.jar-c config.xml Test.java
